CustomField.description: This is the information that is displayed within the Project carousel in the Customer Portal, and is meant to be a short blurb to give info at a glance. Character count is purposefully kept smaller than the full information field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the information that is displayed within the Project carousel in the Customer Portal, and is meant to be a short blurb to give info at a glance.
CustomField.label: Project Information (short)
